title: Drow
content:
ws is likely the race with the most social interaction reactivity. Expect more frequent NPC reactions to your race. During Early Access, the Drow race used to feature +2 Dexterity and +1 Charisma. This has been changed in the full launch of BG3 and the Ability Score points are now associated with the Class that players will choose.
